name: Freed Soft
description:
Freed Soft, simulator is a survival game in its own world. In this world, the main character finds himself in the middle of a confrontation between 2 companies: Maik cor and Treim inc. These factions have started a global war in the IT world and the main character needs to build such an IT company to become the leader of the technology market.


You will have to:
  • Start your own IT company.
  • Upgrade your character.
  • Monitor his vital signs.
  • Collect a variety of items.
  • Create and degrade software.
  • Build and develop your own office.
